original: 已遣人對<color=#fff999>$country1</color>使用借刀殺人計謀，卻遭到<color=#fff999>$country1</color>拒絕！(<color=#bceea7>借刀殺人 失敗</color>)
text: Someone has been sent to use a borrowed knife to kill <color=#fff999>$country1</color>, but was rejected by <color=#fff999>$country1</color>! (<color=#bceea7>Failed to kill with a knife</color>)
